Hello, I’m Frederick.

But you can call me Fred. Nice to meet you.

I’m a Ph.D. student at Georgia Tech studying Computational Science and Engineering in the College of Computing.

About

Besides my studies, I’m an INTJ born on the coast in Melbourne, Florida but currently live in Midtown in Atlanta, Georgia. I’m interested in a multitude of topics spanning the various disciplines of applied mathematics, data science, digital design, visualization, and consumer technology.

Projects

Some of my past endeavors including research projects, academic course projects, and anything else I find interesting.

Blog

Things I think about, read, and discover that I share with the Internet.

Other

I like to write about the Stuff I Use, take Photos, and make Monthly Music Playlists.
